lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Ecuadorean officials held their last formal meeting with the advisory committee in New York in January, but the negotiations were suspended on January 16 due to the 12-hour kidnapping of President Leon Febres Cordero by air force paratroopers.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He said in a statement, "The idea with the foreign banks is to obtain from them the best terms to give the Ecuadorean economy a complete relief in the period of deferral of payments on the foreign debt during the present year."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Cordovez added, Ecuador must make a new proposal in line with the reality since the earthquake by seeking better options of deferment and of softening the negotiation conditions."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Ecuadorean officials held their last formal meeting with the advisory committee in New York in January, but the negotiations were suspended on January 16 due to the 12-hour kidnapping of President Leon Febres Cordero by air force paratroopers.

lst.str: He said in a statement, "The idea with the foreign banks is to obtain from them the best terms to give the Ecuadorean economy a complete relief in the period of deferral of payments on the foreign debt during the present year."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Cordovez added, Ecuador must make a new proposal in line with the reality since the earthquake by seeking better options of deferment and of softening the negotiation conditions."
